author: @HypatiaMuse
text:
I wouldn't be surprised if the 12 year old girl that got killed in the latest shelling of a hospital was targeted - she was interviewed during the ceasefire. I don't recall her saying anything against Israel, just that she wants the war to end. 
They definitely targeted and assassinated Refaat Alareer, the poet and scholar.
